repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p:
Bound codex, entitled pāṣai cillaṟai ont its spine, containing fragments of grammatical works:
TheNaṉṉūl (Indien 168a).
The TBC (Indien 168b).
The Māṟaṉ Alaṅkāram (Indien 168c).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: the front cover. Verso not marbled (blue paper). BnF shelfmark sticker (front cover, recto). Shelfmarks and title on the spine.
2 folios = front guard leaves. Blue paper. Blank recto verso. Shelfmark (f[1]r). Element of library binding.
3 folios = back guard leaves. Blue paper. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
the back cover. Recto not marbled (blue paper).

additions.desc: Shelfmark sticker written in black ink: Aa/3 (spine).

Title printed in golden letters (spine):
pāṣai
cillaṟai
2
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 168 (front cover, verso).
BnF old shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 159 (f[1]r).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Not dated by Vinson (1868) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequested in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 28, n° 168.
Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 41r, no. 159.
Vinson, Julien (1867). Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls. Corrected proofreadings printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. Access No. 4-IMPROR-77 (B). — See p. 41, n° 159.
Vinson, Julien. n.d. BnF Indien 1062, f58r, no. 158 159.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
